title: House for rent, quiet neighborhood, 3/1.5
posting_body: ['A whole home renovation!', 'ALL NEW stainless kitchen appliances, including a large capacity LG refrigerator with french doors and ice maker, LG electric range with large capacity oven, Samsung dishwasher and 1500W microwave.', 'Completely new bathrooms.', 'NEW CARPET through-out, with new durable, attractive vinyl plank flooring in the kitchen and bathrooms.', 'New interior paint.', 'Bi-level home, 3 bedrooms and full bath downstairs; living areas, kitchen, washer & dryer, and half bath upstairs.', 'One of the largest fenced back yards in the neighborhood, with your own gated access to Ketner Open Space.', 'Beautiful Ketner Reservoir is just a couple minutes walk.', 'Enjoy quiet evenings sitting out on your large back deck watching the sun set over the Flatirons.', 'The 1-car garage is extra deep, with space for motorcycle parking or extra storage, and has a workbench and storage shelves.', 'A great location, about 20 minutes to Boulder, 20 minutes to downtown Denver, and within walking distance to the many stores and restaurants at 100th & Wadsworth.', 'Showings at open houses only.', 'Message me for details and dates.', 'Please read thoroughly the application and lease details below.', 'All adults living at the property must be on the lease, and all must be approved by completing an application and passing a background and credit check.', 'Background checks will include contacting recent landlords, or verifying ownership or other living arrangements.', 'Applicants with evictions, collection judgements against them, or having a credit score of less than 700 will not be accepted.', 'Proof of current household gross income is required and must exceed $6600/month.', 'Subletting is not allowed.', 'Pets are allowed after payment of an additional $200 deposit.', 'Owner pays basic water usage fees, garbage pickup and recycling.', 'Tenant pays electricity & gas, and internet and tv as desired.', 'Tenant is responsible for shoveling snow from the sidewalk, and keeping the yard up to code.', 'Smoking is NOT ALLOWED inside the house.', "1st month's rent ($2200 pro-rated) and security deposit ($2200) are due at signing.", 'Rent payments will be made through an electronic service.', ' Lease start date may be negotiable.', 'Owner will be making quarterly visits to the property for general maintenance work.', 'You are renting directly from the property owner, not a management agency or REIT.', 'Note on water service:', 'Owner pays service fees and usage up to 4,000gal/month, which should cover normal usage, a lawn sprinkler system is not available.', "Tenant is responsible for overages, due with the following month's rent."]
